thread.title: Blue Jackets fire Todd Richards, hire John Tortorella
thread.title_full: Blue Jackets fire Todd Richards, hire John Tortorella

title: Blue Jackets fire Todd Richards, hire John Tortorella
text:
> Top News Blue Jackets fire Todd Richards, hire John Tortorella FILE - In this Dec. 13, 2014, file photo, Columbus Blue Jackets head coach Todd Richards gives instructions during the third period of an NHL hockey game against the Pittsburgh Penguins in Columbus, Ohio Saturday, Dec. 13, 2014. After an 0-7 start, the Blue jackets have fired coach Todd Richards and replaced him with John Tortorella, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015.(AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar, File)
